quiz.question: miniature _____
quiz.explanation: 微型的，微型的模型。He built a miniature model of the ship. 他建造了船的微型的模型。

quiz.question: _____ legislature
quiz.explanation: 立法机关，州立法机关。The state legislature passed the bill. 州立法机关通过了法案。

quiz.question: premature _____
quiz.explanation: 早产的，早产的出生。The premature birth required special care. 早产的出生需要特殊护理。

quiz.question: _______ signature
quiz.explanation: 签名，数字签名。Use a digital signature for security. 使用数字签名确保安全。

quiz.question: ________ stature
quiz.explanation: 身材，高大的身材。He had a towering stature. 他有高大的身材。

quiz.question: ____ fracture
quiz.explanation: 骨折，骨骨折。The X-ray showed a bone fracture. X光显示骨骨折。

quiz.question: ____ conjecture
quiz.explanation: 推测，仅仅是推测。That's mere conjecture without proof. 那仅仅是推测没有证据。

quiz.question: _____ stricture
quiz.explanation: 批评，严厉的批评。He issued harsh stricture on the policy. 他对政策发出严厉的批评。

quiz.question: ________ juncture
quiz.explanation: 时刻，关键时刻。We are at a critical juncture. 我们处于关键时刻。

quiz.question: ______ expenditure
quiz.explanation: 支出，公共支出。Public expenditure increased this year. 今年公共支出增加了。

quiz.question: _____ forfeiture
quiz.explanation: 没收，资产没收。Asset forfeiture was ordered by the court. 法院下令资产没收。

quiz.question: ______ discomfiture
quiz.explanation: 尴尬，社交尴尬。His gaffe caused social discomfiture. 他的失礼造成了社交尴尬。

quiz.question: divestiture ____
quiz.explanation: 剥夺，剥夺计划。The company announced a divestiture plan. 公司宣布了剥夺计划。

quiz.question: _____ investiture
quiz.explanation: 授职，皇家授职。The royal investiture ceremony was grand. 皇家授职仪式很隆重。

quiz.question: horticulture _____
quiz.explanation: 园艺，园艺课。She took a horticulture class. 她上了园艺课。

quiz.question: ____ denture
quiz.explanation: 假牙，全口假牙。He needed a full denture. 他需要全口假牙。

quiz.question: indenture ________
quiz.explanation: 契约，契约合同。The servant signed an indenture contract. 仆人签署了契约合同。

quiz.question: ______ cloture
quiz.explanation: 终止辩论，援引终止辩论。The Senate would invoke cloture. 参议院会援引终止辩论。

quiz.question: ____ scripture
quiz.explanation: 经文，神圣的经文。They studied holy scripture. 他们研究神圣的经文。

quiz.question: ______ aperture
quiz.explanation: 光圈，相机光圈。Adjust the camera aperture for brightness. 调整相机光圈以调节亮度。

quiz.question: _______ overture
quiz.explanation: 序曲，音乐会序曲。The concert overture was magnificent. 音乐会序曲很壮丽。

quiz.question: ________ gesture
quiz.explanation: 姿态，友好的姿态。She made a friendly gesture. 她做了友好的姿态。

quiz.question: _____ vesture
quiz.explanation: 服装，皇家服装。The king wore royal vesture. 国王穿着皇家服装。

quiz.question: _____ _ posture
quiz.explanation: 姿势，采取姿势。She would adopt a posture of confidence. 她会采取自信的姿势。

quiz.question: ______ imposture
quiz.explanation: 冒充，巧妙的冒充。It was a clever imposture. 这是巧妙的冒充。

quiz.question: suture ____
quiz.explanation: 缝合线，缝合线。The suture line healed well. 缝合线愈合良好。

quiz.question: azure ___
quiz.explanation: 蔚蓝的，蔚蓝的天空。The azure sky was cloudless. 蔚蓝的天空万里无云。

quiz.question: _______ pyre
quiz.explanation: 火葬柴堆，葬礼火葬柴堆。They lit the funeral pyre. 他们点燃了葬礼火葬柴堆。

quiz.question: base _______
quiz.explanation: 卑鄙的，卑鄙的动机。He acted from base motives. 他出于卑鄙的动机行事。

quiz.question: abase _______
quiz.explanation: 降低身份，降低自己身份。Don't abase oneself before anyone. 不要在任何人面前降低自己身份。

quiz.question: debase ___ ________
quiz.explanation: 贬低，贬低货币。Inflation would debase the currency. 通货膨胀会贬低货币。

quiz.question: appease _____
quiz.explanation: 平息，平息愤怒。Nothing could appease anger. 没有什么能平息愤怒。

quiz.question: grease _____
quiz.explanation: 油脂，油脂污渍。The grease stain was hard to remove. 油脂污渍很难去除。

quiz.question: tease _____
quiz.explanation: 分开，分开。Carefully tease apart the fibers. 小心地分开纤维。

quiz.question: ____ purchase
quiz.explanation: 购买，稳固的立足点。Get a firm purchase on the rope. 在绳子上获得稳固的立足点。

quiz.question: _____-_____ blasé
quiz.explanation: 冷漠的，厌世冷漠的。She had a world-weary blasé attitude. 她有厌世冷漠的态度。

quiz.question: erase ______
quiz.explanation: 抹去，抹去记忆。Time cannot erase memory. 时间无法抹去记忆。

quiz.question: paraphrase ___ ____
quiz.explanation: 改述，改述文本。Please paraphrase the text in your own words. 请用你自己的话改述文本。

quiz.question: obese _______
quiz.explanation: 肥胖的，肥胖的病人。The obese patient needed treatment. 肥胖的病人需要治疗。

quiz.question: _______ malaise
quiz.explanation: 不适，普遍不适。He felt a general malaise. 他感到普遍不适。

quiz.question: precise ___________
quiz.explanation: 精确的，精确的测量。Make a precise measurement. 进行精确的测量。

quiz.question: imprecise ________
quiz.explanation: 不精确的，不精确的估计。The imprecise estimate was misleading. 不精确的估计具有误导性。

quiz.question: incise _ _______
quiz.explanation: 切割，切割图案。The artist would incise a pattern. 艺术家会切割图案。

quiz.question: exorcise ______
quiz.explanation: 驱魔，驱魔。The priest tried to exorcise demons. 牧师试图驱魔。

quiz.question: excise ___
quiz.explanation: 消费税，消费税。Pay the excise tax on tobacco. 缴纳烟草消费税。

quiz.question: disfranchise ______
quiz.explanation: 剥夺选举权，剥夺选民选举权。The law would disfranchise voters. 该法律会剥夺选民选举权。

quiz.question: _____ premise
quiz.explanation: 前提，基本前提。The basic premise is flawed. 基本前提有缺陷。

quiz.question: _____ _ compromise
quiz.explanation: 妥协，达成妥协。They tried to reach a compromise. 他们试图达成妥协。

quiz.question: _________ counterpoise
quiz.explanation: 平衡力量，政治平衡力量。A political counterpoise was needed. 需要政治平衡力量。

quiz.question: turquoise ____
quiz.explanation: 绿松石，绿松石戒指。She wore a turquoise ring. 她戴着绿松石戒指。

quiz.question: _______ reprise
quiz.explanation: 重复，音乐重复。The musical reprise ended the show. 音乐重复结束了演出。

quiz.question: apprise __ _____
quiz.explanation: 通知，通知事实。Please apprise of facts immediately. 请立即通知事实。

quiz.question: _____________ treatise
quiz.explanation: 论文，哲学论文。He wrote a philosophical treatise. 他写了一篇哲学论文。

quiz.question: _________ expertise
quiz.explanation: 专业知识，技术专业知识。She had technical expertise. 她有技术专业知识。

quiz.question: advertise ______
quiz.explanation: 做广告，在线做广告。Companies advertise online now. 公司现在在线做广告。

quiz.question: chastise _____
quiz.explanation: 惩罚，惩罚孩子。Parents may chastise child for misbehavior. 父母可能会因不当行为惩罚孩子。

quiz.question: _____ ___ guise __
quiz.explanation: 伪装，以...为幌子。He acted under the guise of friendship. 他以友谊为幌子行事。

quiz.question: revise _____
quiz.explanation: 修改，修改草稿。Please revise draft carefully. 请仔细修改草稿。

quiz.question: improvise _ ____
quiz.explanation: 即兴创作，即兴创作曲调。The musician would improvise a tune. 音乐家会即兴创作曲调。

quiz.question: _______ supervise
quiz.explanation: 监督，密切监督。The manager would closely supervise. 经理会密切监督。

quiz.question: _____ pulse
quiz.explanation: 脉搏，心跳脉搏。Check the heart pulse regularly. 定期检查心跳脉搏。

quiz.question: repulse ______
quiz.explanation: 击退，击退攻击。The army would repulse attack. 军队会击退攻击。

quiz.question: ______ impulse
quiz.explanation: 冲动，突然冲动。He acted on a sudden impulse. 他出于突然冲动行事。

quiz.question: convulse ____ ________
quiz.explanation: 使痉挛，笑得痉挛。The audience would convulse with laughter. 观众会笑得痉挛。

quiz.question: ______'_ license
quiz.explanation: 执照，驾驶执照。Renew your driver's license. 更新你的驾驶执照。

quiz.question: _______ incense
quiz.explanation: 香，燃烧的香。Burning incense filled the temple. 燃烧的香充满了寺庙。

quiz.question: condense _____
quiz.explanation: 凝结，凝结蒸汽。Cool air would condense steam. 冷空气会凝结蒸汽。

quiz.question: immense ________
quiz.explanation: 巨大的，巨大的压力。He felt immense pressure to succeed. 他感到巨大的压力要成功。

quiz.question: _____ recompense
quiz.explanation: 补偿，提供补偿。They would offer recompense for damages. 他们会为损失提供补偿。

quiz.question: __________ suspense
quiz.explanation: 悬念，加剧的悬念。The music created heightened suspense. 音乐制造了加剧的悬念。

quiz.question: commonsense ________
quiz.explanation: 常识的，常识的解决方案。That's a commonsense solution. 那是常识的解决方案。

quiz.question: rinse _____
quiz.explanation: 冲洗，冲洗周期。Select the rinse cycle. 选择冲洗周期。

quiz.question: verbose ______
quiz.explanation: 冗长的，冗长的报告。The verbose report was too long. 冗长的报告太长了。

quiz.question: bellicose ________
quiz.explanation: 好战的，好战的言辞。His bellicose rhetoric was alarming. 他好战的言辞令人担忧。

quiz.question: _____ glucose
quiz.explanation: 葡萄糖，血糖。Monitor blood glucose levels. 监测血糖水平。

quiz.question: ____ overdose
quiz.explanation: 过量，药物过量。The patient suffered a drug overdose. 患者遭受了药物过量。

quiz.question: metamorphose ____
quiz.explanation: 变形，变形成。The caterpillar would metamorphose into a butterfly. 毛毛虫会变形成蝴蝶。

quiz.question: grandiose ______
quiz.explanation: 浮夸的，浮夸的计划。His grandiose scheme failed. 他浮夸的计划失败了。

quiz.question: otiose ______
quiz.explanation: 无用的，无用的努力。That was an otiose effort. 那是无用的努力。

quiz.question: foreclose _ ________
quiz.explanation: 取消抵押品赎回权，取消抵押贷款赎回权。The bank would foreclose a mortgage. 银行会取消抵押贷款赎回权。

quiz.question: disclose _______
quiz.explanation: 披露，披露细节。Please disclose details of the plan. 请披露计划的细节。

quiz.question: lachrymose _____
quiz.explanation: 催人泪下的，催人泪下的戏剧。The lachrymose drama was emotional. 催人泪下的戏剧很感人。

quiz.question: _______ ___ noose
quiz.explanation: 套索，收紧套索。They would tighten the noose. 他们会收紧套索。

quiz.question: ______ _ pose
quiz.explanation: 姿势，摆姿势。The model would strike a pose. 模特会摆姿势。

quiz.question: juxtapose _____
quiz.explanation: 并置，并置想法。The essay would juxtapose ideas. 文章会并置想法。

quiz.question: depose _ _____
quiz.explanation: 废黜，废黜统治者。The rebels would depose a ruler. 叛军会废黜统治者。

quiz.question: impose _ ___
quiz.explanation: 征收，征收税收。The government would impose a tax. 政府会征收税收。

quiz.question: superimpose ______
quiz.explanation: 叠加，叠加层。Superimpose layers in the image. 在图像中叠加层。

quiz.question: compose _______
quiz.explanation: 使镇定，使自己镇定。Take time to compose oneself. 花时间使自己镇定。

quiz.question: decompose _____
quiz.explanation: 分解，分解废物。Bacteria decompose waste naturally. 细菌自然分解废物。

quiz.question: interpose _ ________
quiz.explanation: 插入，插入问题。He would interpose a question. 他会插入问题。

quiz.question: dispose __ _____
quiz.explanation: 处理，处理废物。Properly dispose of waste. 妥善处理废物。

quiz.question: transpose ____
quiz.explanation: 移调，移调音调。Transpose keys for the singer. 为歌手移调音调。

quiz.question: prose _____
quiz.explanation: 散文，散文风格。He wrote in a clear prose style. 他用清晰的散文风格写作。

quiz.question: comatose _______
quiz.explanation: 昏迷的，昏迷的病人。The comatose patient needed care. 昏迷的病人需要护理。

quiz.question: relapse ____ _______
quiz.explanation: 复发，复发疾病。He would relapse into illness. 他会复发疾病。

quiz.question: _____ _ glimpse
quiz.explanation: 瞥见，瞥见。I managed to catch a glimpse. 我设法瞥见了。

quiz.question: rehearse _____
quiz.explanation: 排练，排练台词。Actors rehearse lines before performance. 演员在演出前排练台词。

quiz.question: coarse ________
quiz.explanation: 粗俗的，粗俗的语言。Avoid coarse language. 避免粗俗的语言。

quiz.question: terse _____
quiz.explanation: 简洁的，简洁的回复。He gave a terse reply. 他给出了简洁的回复。
